price: 122. Kemudian Tuhannya memilih dia,*(528) maka Dia menerima taubatnya dan memberinya petunjuk.
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ
footnotes: *528). Allah memilih Nabi Adam -'alaihissalām- untuk menjadi orang yang dekat kepada-Nya.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
